name: Yggdrasil
text: A third-person brawler game set in a Norse inspired futuristic world. I in Unreal Engine 4 as part of a team, primarily developing the AI and animation systems, as well as the UI.

name: MAR-Interact
text: This is a novel 6DOF 3D object manipulation system for use on smartphones in AR applications. Currently being worked on as part of a research paper I am writing in collaboration with Lancaster University, and the the Eindhoven University of Technology. This functions as an expansion and iteration of my bachelor's degree project.

name: Object Manipulation in AR (Bachelor's Degree Project)
text: This is my first iteration of a novel 6DOF 3D object manipulation system in AR. This functioned as the practical project for my bachelor's degree, and includes the applications used for two studies. It also includes a multi-touch gesture and UI based approach to 6DOF manipulation.
